title: Understanding Slide Titles
text: Consider the role of a title in summarizing and highlighting the main point of the data presented. It's not just about looking good but having a crucial role in guiding attention.

title: Memory Trigger
text: Think about how a well-written title could act as a mental cue, helping audiences retain the key message of the slides.

hintAnswer: People fixate on the title and are more likely to accurately remember the data if the title says something about the data.
title: Finalizing Thought
text: This extra peak of interest through titles might not just grab attention but also aid in better memory retention of what the slide presents.
choices: People are more likely to accurately remember the data if the title says something about the data.
People fixate on the title and are more likely to accurately remember the data if the title says something about the data.
People like a good title and they will remember it if well written or amusing.
